doc:
Maurice Argent https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Argent 0 Maurice (Maury) Saul Argent (4 March 1916 – 7 December 1981) was a character actor from Pennsylvania who acted between 1957 and 1980. In addition to his film roles (below), he is remembered for his stage performances with the San Francisco Actor's Workshop. He played the title role in the Workshop's widely hailed 1953 production of Arthur Miller's Death of a Salesman.He taught stagecraft to generations of San Francisco teens at George Washington High School and Lowell High School. Argent died in San Francisco, California on 7 December 1981 at age 65. Maurice ( Maury ) Saul_Argent ( 4_March_1916 – 7_December_1981 ) was a_character_actor from Pennsylvania who acted between 1957_and_1980 . In addition to his_film_roles ( below ) , he is_remembered for his_stage_performances with the_San_Francisco_Actor 's_Workshop . He played the_title_role in the_Workshop 's widely_hailed 1953_production of Arthur_Miller 's_Death of a_Salesman.He taught stagecraft to generations of San_Francisco_teens at George_Washington_High_School and Lowell_High_School . Argent died in San_Francisco , California on 7_December_1981 at age_65 .
